createConfirm: Showing the bracket will lock editing of pairs. Continue?
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the bracket? This will allow editing pairs again.
noBracketAndPairs: No bracket created and no pairs. Click "Create Random Bracket" or add pairs first.
confirmClear: Are you sure? This will delete all players and pairs.
needAtLeastPairs: You need at least {n} pairs to create a bracket
